summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2325, for the improvement of 12th Avenue and 12th Avenue South, from Jackson Street to East Denny Way, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading; providing for the construction or reconstruction of all sewers, side sewers and watermains, with their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 24035 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
